definition: start of the year/whole year/a particular year/period/days/epoch/a year's harvest
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 年頭|年头[nian2 tou2]

sentences.english: Some years Non-Vintage can be more fun.
sentences.chinese: 一些年頭，非葡萄酒釀造會更有趣。

sentences.english: Next spring, Muret will celebrate 29 years with the company.
sentences.chinese: 明天春天，穆勒特將迎來他在公司的第29個年頭。

sentences.english: Mr Jobs has shared his spleen around over the years.
sentences.chinese: 喬布斯的壞脾氣年頭已經不小。

sentences.english: I have survived over 40 years of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 我大病不死已經超過了40多個年頭。

sentences.english: These days, a unit test can mean anything.
sentences.chinese: 這年頭，單元測試能代表一切。

sentences.english: He has been doing this sort of work for years.
And Mike lived that way, with a very damaged eye of that sort for 43 years.
sentences.chinese: 帶着嚴重受傷的眼睛，邁克就這樣生活了43個年頭。

sentences.english: The construction period lasted ten years.
sentences.chinese: 建設週期跨越十個年頭。

sentences.english: There are always records. Everyone has records these days.
sentences.chinese: 這肯定有檔案，這年頭每個人都該有檔案的。

sentences.english: The unique cork foot bed of the Good Year Welt construction will mold to your foot as you wear them.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的軟木腳牀的好年頭沿條建設將模具穿著你的腳。

sentences.english: You returned to your home half a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 您返回家鄉已經有半個年頭了，我十分想念您。

sentences.english: 's years since we've seen each other.
sentences.chinese: 我們有年頭兒沒見面了。

sentences.english: Shaykh Abu Muhammad (q) had been married for years and all his children were girls. He had no boys.
sentences.chinese: 導師結婚有些年頭了，但是沒有生下一個兒子。

sentences.english: My father, even my family could not afford it at all.
sentences.chinese: 那年頭，我父親，甚至我們全家也買不起它。

sentences.english: The war went on for four bitter years, with ups and downs on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭進行了四個艱苦的年頭，雙方互有勝負。

sentences.english: B： Criminals are really sneaky these days.
sentences.chinese: 這年頭的罪犯還真是狡猾。
